name: VerticallyRelativeTo
shortdesc: The vertical alignment point of an anchored object.

property.name: COLUMN_EDGE
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the edge of the text or table column.

property.name: TEXT_FRAME
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the edge of the text frame.

property.name: PAGE_MARGINS
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the page margin.

property.name: PAGE_EDGE
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the edge of the page.

property.name: LINE_BASELINE
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the baseline of the line of text.

property.name: LINE_XHEIGHT
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the top of lower case letters with no ascent, such as x.

property.name: LINE_ASCENT
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the top of the tallest letters in the text.

property.name: CAPHEIGHT
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the top of capital letters.

property.name: TOP_OF_LEADING
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the top of the text leading.

property.name: EMBOX_TOP
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the top of the embox.

property.name: EMBOX_MIDDLE
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the middle of the embox.

property.name: EMBOX_BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Align the anchored object to the bottom of the embox.
